result.title: The HEIR 1st layer of services package: 1st complete version
result.description: D42 will be delivered in M18 and will include the 1st complete version of the 1st layer of services package and specifically i the novel HEIR Client ii the threat detection module and the services for the RAMA score calculations at different levels iii the toolset for the visualisation of the HEIR reported security levels incidents threats statistics etc and iv the novel HEIR Aggregators The demonstrator will be presented in a short report

result.title: Dissemination strategy and activities, stakeholders' engagement and business opportunities - P1
result.description: The deliverable will be reporting in detail i the communication and dissemination strategies and plans that will integrate the project specific information with the requirements of the various market segments through the exploitation of the dissemination channels ii the development of the necessary dissemination material iii various dissemination activities that will be carried out such as papers publication presentations in conferences news publishing newsletters writing etc and iv the networking and liaisons with technical domainspecific communities policy makers and local authorities

result.title: The HEIR 2nd layer of services package for the MVP
result.description: This report will be delivered in M12 and will include the 2nd layer of services package for the MVP and specifically i the HEIR Observatory ii the HEIR global benchmark against which the RAMA scores of medical infrastructures will be compared and iii the subsystem for the 2nd global layer of visualization The demonstrator will be presented in a short report

result.title: The HEIR website and visual identity
result.description: D81 will be delivered in M2 reporting the design and development of the HEIR website and visual identity The website aims to act as a powerful tool for boosting information flow between all entities involved Revisions regarding the usability of the website with respect to the enduser will be made in addition to updates with contribution of content by all consortium members
